title: GO Enrichment Analysis
questions: How can I functionally interpret a list of genes of interest that I obtained from my experiment?
objectives: How to perform a GO Enrichment Analysis
How to interpret and simplify the results
key_points: The goenrichment tool can be used to perform GO Enrichment analysis
One needs to be careful when chosing the background population
There are several methods to simplify the output of the GO Enrichment analysis

workflows.name: GO Enrichment Workflow
workflows.title: GO Enrichment Workflow
